Package com.example.librarian_module.sys

Class Librarian

java.lang.Object
com.example.librarian_module.sys.Librarian
public class Librarian extends Object
The class Librarian manages the librarians in the library system.
Since:
2022-03-04

  • Constructor Details

    • Librarian

      public Librarian()
      Create an empty librarian.

    • Librarian

      public Librarian(String lid, String uid, String pwd)
      Create a librarian object with the specified parameters. Creating the object does not mean it has been added to the system.
      Parameters:
      lid - Unique ID of a librarian.
      uid - User ID of login account.
      pwd - Password of the login account.

  • Method Details

    • insertLibrarian

      public static void insertLibrarian(String lid, String uid, String pwd, Account.AccessLevel lvl)
      Add the librarian with the specified parameters to the library system.
      Parameters:
      lid - Unique ID of a librarian.
      uid - User ID of login account.
      pwd - Password of the login account.
      lvl - Access level of the librarian.

    • deleteLibrarian

      public static void deleteLibrarian(String lid)
      Delete the librarian with the specified librarian ID.
      Parameters:
      lid - Unique ID of a librarian.

    • getActiveLibrarian

      public static Librarian getActiveLibrarian(String uid)
      Get the librarian object who is logged in with the specified userid.
      Parameters:
      uid - User ID of login account of a librarian.
      Returns:
      A Librarian object representing the logged in librarian.

    • loadLibrarianDB

      public static void loadLibrarianDB()
      load the data in librarian database file into RAM.

    • addBookGui

      public Item.StatusCode addBookGui()
      Launch the add book Gui.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the operation.

    • addBook

      public Item.StatusCode addBook(String bid, String tle, String lname, String fname, String ed, String ISBN, String yr, String pgs, String cps, String cat)
      Add a book with the specified parameters to the library system. It calls Book.add() to perform the actual operation.
      Parameters:
      bid - ID used as the key of the book.
      tle - Title of the book.
      lname - Last name of the author of the book.
      fname - First name of the author of the book.
      ed - An integer representing the edition of the book.
      ISBN - International Standard Book Number of the book.
      yr - Published year of the book.
      pgs - Number of pages of the book.
      cps - Number of copies of the book.
      cat - Genre of the book.
      Returns:
      An enum type StatusCode representing the result of the add book operation.

    • viewBooksGui

      public Item.StatusCode viewBooksGui()
      Launch the view book Gui.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the operation.

    • issueBookGui

      public Item.StatusCode issueBookGui()
      Launch the issue book Gui.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the operation.

    • issueBook

      public Item.StatusCode issueBook(String bid, String ed, String bwrid)
      Issue a book with the specified book ID and edition to a borrower with the specified ID. It calls Book.issue() to perform the actual operation.
      Parameters:
      bid - ID used as the key of the book.
      ed - An integer representing the edition of the book.
      bwrid - ID of the borrower of the book.
      Returns:
      An enum type StatusCode representing the result of the issue book operation.

    • returnBookGui

      public Item.StatusCode returnBookGui()
      Launch the return book Gui.
      Returns:
      An enum StatusCode representing the result of the operation.

    • returnBook

      public Item.StatusCode returnBook(String bid, String ed, String bwrid)
      Return a book with the specified book ID and edition from the borrower with the specified ID. It calls Book.returnBack() to perform the actual operation.
      Parameters:
      bid - ID used as the key of the book.
      ed - An integer representing the edition of the book.
      bwrid - ID of the borrower of the book.
      Returns:
      An enum type StatusCode representing the result of the return book operation.

    • initReport

      public void initReport()
      Preparation to write book data to book data file.

    • getNextRec

      public String getNextRec()
      Get book data referred to by the record pointer of the books array list. The fields are separated by "|". It also writes the book data to the book data file.
      Returns:
      A string representing the book data.

    • closeReport

      public void closeReport()
      Close the book data file.
